body.name: Amazfit Active Smart Watch with AI Fitness Exercise Coach, GPS, Bluetooth Calling & Music, 14 Day Battery, 1.75" AMOLED Display & Alexa Built-in, Fitness Watch for Android & iPhone, Pink
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 19 mins
features: Super-light and Stylish Design: The Amazfit Active smartwatch is like finery with a mind of a super-computer. Feel confident and ready for action, anytime and anywhere. Choose from over 100 colorful watch face options, and immerse yourself in a vivid 1.75" HD AMOLED experience.

Ultra-long 14-day Battery Life: Life doesn't pause, and neither should you. Stay charged through meetings, moments, and miles. To keep up with your busy work life, social life and workout routine, you need energy; you need the Amazfit Active.

AI-powered Training Guidance by Zepp Coach: Sometimes, the hardest part of leading an active life is just finding the time. Zepp Coach harnesses the power of AI to generate workout plans that are tailored to you. Personalize your schedule, target your training, manage your recovery and understand your progress.

5 Satellite Positioning Systems & Route Navigation: The Amazfit Active smart watch will track every turn you take through the city streets and every trail you explore through the great outdoors. If you're planning a trek through an unfamiliar path, easily import a route file from the Zepp App, and navigate with incredible precision.

Bluetooth Phone Calls & Music Playback: Via Bluetooth connection to your phone, the smart watch can answer incoming calls or dial outgoing calls, control your phone's camera and music, and more. You can even store your music on the watch for phone-free playback of your favorite playlists.
Mental and Physical Readiness Analysis: Get unique insights into your well-being and recovery with Readiness - calculated based on your sleep breathing quality, sleep heart rate and temperature.
Training Templates: Create your own training templates to help you stay focused on your goal and keep track of your progress.

Sync To Your Favorite Health Apps: Through the Zepp App, you can connect and sync data to your favorite health and fitness apps like Strava, adidas Running, Apple Health, Google Fit, Relive, and komoot.

24-hour Health Monitoring: Stay on top of your health readings. The smart watch constantly monitors your heart rate, blood-oxygen and stress levels, and provides you with alerts for abnormal readings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Live With Style And Energy The Lavendar Purple model combines the strength and beauty of a rose gold stainless steel frame with the luxurious texture of a vegan leather strap. The Midnight Black and Petal Pink models are crafted with a lightweight aluminum alloy frame, embodying both style and action.

Ultra-large Always-on Display With a huge choice of over 100 stylish watch faces, it's wasy to immerse yourself in the super-bright and high resolution AMOLED display. Personalize every moment by uploading your own photos to the watch face. Ultra-long Battery Life Life doesn't pause, and neither should you. Stay charged through meetings, moments, and miles. 14 Days with Typical Usage30 Days with Battery Saver Mode10 Days with Heavy Usage16 Hours with GPS Continuous Usage Note: Tests are conducted in-lab. Results may vary according to usage. Mental & Physical Readiness Analysis Discover your daily recovery, with Readiness. Generated based on your sleep resting heart rate, sleep heart rate variability, breathing quality and temperature, your unique morning Readiness score tunes into your mental and physical condition.

Accurate GPS Tracking The Amazfit Active will track every turn you take through the city streets and every trail you explore through the great outdoors. Planning a trek through an unfamiliar path? Import a route file from the Zepp App, and navigate with incredible precision. The Smarter Way to Stay Active Sometimes, the hardest part of leading an active life is just finding the time. Zepp Coach harnesses the power of AI to generate workout plans that are personalized to your schedule, needs and goals, and will let you know when to step up the intensity or take a rest. Choose Action! Running, swimming, yoga, and a lot more. Whatever makes you want to get moving, the Amazfit Active will be right there with you. The watch can even auto-detect 7 sports movements to help you get moving faster. Set the watch to read out your sports data in real-time, and you won't even need to raise your wrist to check your performance.

Create Custom Training Templates More efficient training means more free time. Create your own training templates in the Zepp App and sync them to the watch - or streamline your workouts with customizable interval training plans. Stay Active, Stay Healthy Stay informed with incredibly accurate health monitoring for Heart Rate, Blood-oxygen, Stress and Sleep. Stay alert with reminders for abnormal Heart Rate, Blood-oxygen, and Stress data readings. Stay in control with simultaneous one-tap measuring of 3 health metrics: Heart Rate, Blood-oxygen and Stress. Stay prepared with predictions and reminders for upcoming fertile and menstrual periods. An Active Life, Made Fun and Easy Music Storage & Control Store music on the watch and listen to your workout playlist, phone-free. Alternatively, use the watch to control your phone's music. Share Your Activity Sync data to online communities like adidas Running, Strava, komoot and Relive, along with smartphone apps like Apple Health and Google Fit, via the Zepp App.

Your Personal Smart Assistant Ask questions, get translations and a whole lot more, with Amazon Alexa. Make your day more manageable, thanks to this intelligent online voice assistant. Note: Amazon, Alexa and all related marks are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. Stay In-touch with Bluetooth Calling Via Bluetooth connection to your phone, the watch can answer incoming calls or dial outgoing calls, control your phone's camera and music, sync notifications, send preset quick replies, and more. Note: Phone camera control is only supported by iOS; quick replies are only supported by Android. Health-centered Zepp OS 2.0 Enjoy enhanced compatability with both iOS and Android smartphones, along with powerful Bluetooth compatibility than allows the watch to connect to exercise devices like a heart rate belt. You can even craft your own ideal smartwatch experience, with a huge range of downloadable apps and fun games to choose from.

Zepp Aura Get the rest your body deserves, with AI-generated sleep sounds that intelligently adjust based on real-time data picked up by your Amazfit Active. Along with detailed sleep reports and powerful insights, Zepp Aura also generates soundscapes dedicated to meditation and relaxation. Premium subscribers can also access the Zepp Wellness Coach for daily, weekly and monthly sleep analysis, and an AI chatbot sleep coach. Zepp Fitness Membership Dive deep into your fitness journey with insightful weekly and monthly snapshots. Sharpen your focus, reach those milestones. Our AI chatbot, powered by advanced Large Language Models, offers training tips, nutrition guidance, and more. Note： These are services available in the US and select countries/regions in Europe. Free trials require signing up for a subscription, and must be redeemed within 3 months of purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow the Chinese got it right this time ! I was skeptical of these cheap watches as other off brand products based off name brand designs usually turn out crappy but this watch is not the case, it stands on it’s own. I owned fitbit and samsung watches before but they lost me as a repeat customer, samsung watch2 claimed to be waterproof and broke due to water intrusion, not to mention newer models are not compatible with apple iphone. My fit bit was ok but the last few designs are not of my liking and i’m too cheap to pay for a apple watch plus the battery life is laughable. This gem right here will do everything you need it to. Is waterproof, accurate, well designed, the app is very well done, no connectivity issues with the notifications and the battery life is insanely great i mean a whole week on one charge ! I highly recommend it. The only thing it does not do that other high end watches do is the ecg and temperature readings but at $169.00 vs $280+ they can keep it ! Well done Amazfit well done !Update !! 10/20 Two weeks in watch still works great except for the speaker. It broke by they are sending a replacement. i would suggest keep the volume low so that it last. other than that is great .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, but Amazfit Active version lacks built-in Alexa
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Amazfit Active version that advertises the alexa bilt-in feature but the fact is that the feature is not available. In fact, Amazfit site clearly states that the Active model doesn't have that feature. Despite that, the watch is really a good one with a lot of cool features and great screen faces. Battery last a lot, but i think 14 days is hard to achieve in normal use with notifications and regular checking last some 7 to 10 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good health tracking watch.
reviews.reviewText: I like this watch but it does have its issues. It is a good health tracking watch. A few changes could make it great health tracking watch.Pros:1. Very Bright Screen. The screen is bright and colorful. I have it set to about 15% brightness or less and I have no trouble seeing anything on the screen.2. Great OS. The Operating System is very responsive and easy to navigate. Virtually no latency when swiping on the screen.3. Long Battery Life. I have been using this watch for 10 days now and so far it has worked well. The battery is still at 46% on day 10. I even have the watch set to scan me at least once every minute.Cons:1. Extremely Poor selection of free watch faces2. Poor selection of apps3. Very temperamental when taking the stress test. It didn't have any issues getting a reading the first week I had it, but it does now.4. Soft glass. The screen is easy to scratch.5. My biggest complaint is that I CANNOT pair another device to the Zepp app at the same time as my watch.6. I have also found that this watch CANNOT have any devices paired with it other than headphones and the phone app.7. The Zepp app also does NOT allow devices from other manufacturers to pair with it. This is a major negative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall, the Best SmartWatch I've Found...
reviews.reviewText: Long term user/early adopter of Wear OS smartwatches, and everyone in my family (except me the lone non-Apple holdout) has an Apple Watch. I can definitely say that overall this is the best smartwatch I've used, and, yes, that even includes the Apple Watches.First of all, not even for one second am I going to invest in yet another Wear OS watch. I had a couple of Wear OS 1.0 watches, including one that was upgradeable to Wear OS 2.0, which basically rendered the watch unusable. I then upgraded to a Wear OS 2.0 watch only to have Google and the watch manufacturer just completely abandon the watch and the entire platform. Now Google has come out with Wear OS 3.0 as if they first two completely failed versions never existed, and want me to pay $300-500 for it??? No, thank you! So, I started looking at alternative watches like TicWatch, Garmin, Fitbit, etc., when I came across this AmazFit brand. I was immediately impressed with the features/price ratio. I had just about settled on the AmazFit GTS 4 Mini when I decided to go for the AmazFit GTS 4 instead.The AmazFit GTS 4 does everything and more that I want from a smartwatch. It has far more sports modes, better GPS system, vastly superior battery life, and more accurate bio sensors than any other watch out there I've tried. I've had Wear OS watches that allowed me to initiate as well as fully respond to SMS text messages, and frankly I found the whole process to be cumbersome and almost useless. This watch allows you to receive notifications of incoming texts, and even quick respond with pre-defined custom messages. You can also receive, dismiss, or even answer/talk phone calls. I can also receive (or not) notifications on my watch for every other app on my phone, control YouTube Music, Spotify, Amazon Music, and even download music to the watch and use bluetooth headphones/earbuds to listen to it without having my phone nearby. It monitors sleep very accurately, and all the bio sensors seem to be very accurate and reliable. Setting up and configuring the watch was much easier than setting up my Wear OS watches and getting them to work properly, and it was even easier than setting up my family member's Apple Watches.The AmazFit brand is also popular enough that you can get accessories for them, like charging docks, screen protectors/cases, watch bands, etc. -- everything that you can only get for like the Apple Watch, but can't get for the Wear OS watches because Android hardware is so fractured.So far the AmazFit GTS 4 has actually functioned flawlessly and I haven't encountered anything that didn't work or feel like I'm missing any feature(s). Simply put, it's just a great watch, especially if you're using an Android phone.One Week Update: I've now been using this watch for a full week and I still feel the same about it -- simply the best smartwatch I've encountered. In this week I've found even more watch faces and even found an online editor that allows me to create my own custom watch face. I'm running the same or similar faces to my family's Apple Watches, including Mickey and Minnie Mouse, etc. My sleep monitoring has been spot on as has my heart BPM. I'm counting steps, miles, and time in multiple apps, and I can definitely say that the AmazFit GTS 4 is as accurate as all of them. It also has identical accuracy to my wife's Apple Watch. The battery life has been superb. I walked all around Disney World for over 12 hours with the watch tracking my steps and heartbeat automatically, but also keeping track of my walking, as well as reading/answering texts, phone calls, etc. throughout the day, and the battery never went below 70%. At the end of the day my phone with its 5,000ah battery only had ~25% charge left. My previous Wear OS watches would've been dead after 6-8 hours of heavy use like that, and my wife's Apple Watch was at ~20% charge at the end of the day. Still absolutely loving this watch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice smart watch at an excellent price
reviews.reviewText: This replaced another well-known brand smart watch I have. This watch has similar features to the brand name watch, but the battery life on this watch absolutely blows away the other one! I would get a day and a half, maybe 2 days out of the brand name watch before needing to be recharged. This one easily goes for well over a week and more. The features I really wanted were to be able to receive texts and phone calls on a watch and this does both very well. The screen is very bright and is easily viewable. It's also very light and hardly noticeable when I wear it. The band works well and is secure. This watch also charges very quickly to 100 percent. I'd buy it again.

Funciona perfectamente, puedo recibir notificaciones de casi todas las app que me interesan (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, telegram, gmail, Amazon, llamadas. SMS) fscil de configurar y las funciones de ejercicio trabajan excelente.Tiene un sonido fuerte y claro. Me encanto elegí esta versión porque al menos para mi la versión redonda en esta generación es demasiado grande pero este esta mas equilibrado.Aun no se muy bien como activar Alexa, pero es cosa de investigar, las correas no son tan lindas pero esta versión era más barata que las demás y hay muchas opciones en colores y diseños de correa para comprar aparte. El vidrio de la caratula resiste bastante, lo he golpeado accidentalmente y hasta ahora después de dos meses de uso no tiene ni un rasguño.La batería dura bastante con un uso normal, (tengo configurada una carátula con un consumo no elevado de energía y no reproduzco música en el) me diera hasta 10 días y aun con poca batería en el modo ahorra de energía dura muchísimo.Súper recomendado

Me sorprendió la cantidad de funciones y sobre todo la capacidad de carga en batería. Usualmente los smarwatch tienden a agotar rápidamente la carge, en este modelo me dura mínimo una semana. Buen precio para la buena calidad del smartwatch. Recomendable!!
Me impresionó, lo compré para regalo y rebasó mis expectativas
Esse smartwatch é muito bom, ficou lindo na minha namorada, ela adorou, ainda conta com uma ótima bateria e dá pra adicionar alguns apps
